root.name: Rance III: Leazas Kanraku
root.description: Rance III's subtitle translates as "Fall of Leazas."StaffGiving credit for earlier Japanese games is difficult as many contributors went by handles, however The Rance III credits offer up the following key Alicesoft employees:Scenario Writer: TADA.Programmers: WAO, NYAN, Plum FieldCG Artwork: YUKIMI, Purin, K, Kaori, ChiibouSystem Porting (From the X68000 to the PC-9801): ShigeMusic programming (BGM) porting: Shade
